014package org.jdbi.v3.testing.junit5;
015
016import javax.sql.DataSource;
017
018import de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded.DatabaseInfo;
019import de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.junit5.EmbeddedPgExtension;
020import de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.junit5.SingleDatabaseBuilder;
021import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
022
023/**
024 * Jdbi PostgreSQL JUnit 5 rule using the pg-embedded component.
025 * <p>
026 * Using this class with the {@code @ExtendWith} annotation is equivalent to using the {@link SingleDatabaseBuilder} to create a {@link EmbeddedPgExtension}
027 * that creates a new postgres instance per test. This is slower than using the {@link de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.junit5.MultiDatabaseBuilder} and using
028 * {@link JdbiExtension#postgres(EmbeddedPgExtension)}.
029 * <p>
030 * Override methods for special case construction:
031 *
032 * <pre>{@code
033 *     @RegisterExtension
034 *     public JdbiExtension extension = new JdbiPostgresExtension(pg) {
035 *         @Override
036 *         protected DataSource createDataSource() {
037 *            ...
038 *         }
039 *     };
040 * }</pre>
041 * <p>
042 * Use with {@link org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtendWith}:
043 *
044 * <pre>{@code
045 * @ExtendWith(JdbiPostgresExtension.class)
046 * public class DatabaseTest {
047 *     @Test
048 *     public void testWithJdbi(Jdbi jdbi) {
049 *         ...
050 *     }
051 *
052 *     @Test
053 *     public void testWithHandle(Handle handle) {
054 *         ...
055 *     }
056 * }
057 * }</pre>
058 */
059public class JdbiPostgresExtension extends JdbiExtension {
060
061    private final EmbeddedPgExtension pg;
062    private final boolean extendsWith;
063
064    private volatile DatabaseInfo info;
065
066    static final JdbiExtension instance(EmbeddedPgExtension pg) {
067
068        return new JdbiPostgresExtension(pg);
069    }
070
071    protected JdbiPostgresExtension(EmbeddedPgExtension pg) {
072        this.pg = pg;
073        this.extendsWith = false;
074    }
075
076    public JdbiPostgresExtension() {
077        this.pg = SingleDatabaseBuilder.instanceWithDefaults().build();
078        this.extendsWith = true;
079    }
080
081    @Override
082    public String getUrl() {
083        return info.asJdbcUrl();
084    }
085
086    @Override
087    protected DataSource createDataSource() throws Exception {
088        return info.asDataSource();
089    }
090
091    @Override
092    public void beforeEach(ExtensionContext context) throws Exception {
093
094        if (info != null) {
095            throw new IllegalStateException("info has been set!");
096        }
097
098        if (this.extendsWith) {
099            pg.beforeEach(context);
100        }
101
102        info = pg.createDatabaseInfo();
103
104        super.beforeEach(context);
105    }
106
107    @Override
108    public void afterEach(ExtensionContext context) throws Exception {
109        if (info == null) {
110            throw new IllegalStateException("info has been set!");
111        }
112
113        try {
114            super.afterEach(context);
115        } finally {
116            this.info = null;
117
118            if (this.extendsWith) {
119                pg.afterEach(context);
120            }
121        }
122    }
123}
